text: Ngempela uyobathola bengabantu abanzima kakhulu ebutheni kulabo abakholwayo, amaJuda nalabo abenzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni futhi ngempela uyothola ukuthi abasondele kakhulu ngothando kulabo abakholwayo ilabo abathi thina singamaKhrestu lokho kungenxa yokuthi kubona kunabaphristi namaMonk (amandea esilisa) nokuthi bona abaziqhayisi
